values:
The story of man
Makes me sick
Inside, outside,
I don't know why
Something so conditional
And all talk
Should hurt me so.

I am hurt
I am scared
I want to live
I want to die
I don't know
Where to turn
In the Void
And when
To cut
Out

For no Church told me
No Guru holds me
No advice
Just stone
Of New York
And on the cafeteria
We hear
The saxophone
O dead Ruby
Died of Shot
In Thirty Two,
Sounding like old times
And de bombed
Empty decapitated
Murder by the clock.

And I see Shadows
Dancing into Doom
In love, holding
Tight the lovely asses
Of the little girls
In love with sex
Showing themselves
In white undergarments
At elevated windows
Hoping for the Worst.

I can't take it
Anymore
If I can't hold
My little behind
To me in my room

Then it's goodbye
Sangsara
For me
Besides
Girls aren't as good
As they look
And Samadhi
Is better
Than you think
When it starts in
Hitting your head
In with Buzz
Of glittergold
Heaven's Angels
Wailing

Saying

We've been waiting for you
Since Morning, Jack
Why were you so long
Dallying in the sooty room?
This transcendental Brilliance
Is the better part
(of Nothingness 
I sing)

Okay.
Quit.
Mad.
Stop.

Afraid of the dark?

The child

Sleeps

Curled in a ball, with

Lost dreams

And

A forgotten doll.

The child

Sleeps

Never making a peep,

With eyes squeed

Shut

Hoping to see,

See a last

Speck of light.

The child

Sleeps

Forever alone.

VIII.

Music to hear, why hear'st thou music sadly?
Sweets with sweets war not, joy delights in joy.
Why lovest thou that which thou receivest not gladly,
Or else receivest with pleasure thine annoy?
If the true concord of well-tuned sounds,
By unions married, do offend thine ear,
They do but sweetly chide thee, who confounds
In singleness the parts that thou shouldst bear.
Mark how one string, sweet husband to another,
Strikes each in each by mutual ordering,
Resembling sire and child and happy mother
Who all in one, one pleasing note do sing:
Whose speechless song, being many, seeming one,
Sings this to thee: 'thou single wilt prove none.' 

Shakespeare

Top Ten Reasons Why Sex Is Better Than School
10.... Everbody likes sex and nobody likes school,except for virgins and only because they havent had sex yet. 
9.... Sex sucks, moans, licks, pumps, throbs etc... School just sucks. 
8.... After sex you feel like smoking a cigarette. After school you feel like smoking something a whole hell of a lot stronger. 
7.... You only get disciplined during sex if you want to. 
6.... Drinking drives people to sex, where as school drives people to drink. 
5....Sex relieves stress. School is the cause of stress. 
4.... Nothing beats the hands on experience you get with sex. 
3.... After sex you feel like you have accomplished something. 
2.... Sex is cheaper. Even if you have to pay for a hooker, it is still cheaper than paying thousands of dollars in tuition.
And the Number 1 reason why sex is better than school is........ 
1.... At least you have a choice whether or not you want to have sex. At school your teachers screw you regardless.

Yay, I get to go back to Ireland! w00t-w00t. What the... I didn't just say that... Shit, been hanging out with Rob too much, oh well. Weee, My mommy is the coolest, she going with me. So during the day we get to go run around and do... the things that people do in Ireland. Then at night I get to go boogy with mi amigo Kenny. Hmmm, guess all my hard earned summer hire money's going to be dead soon. Yep, I don't like it here. Bye bye

Ummm... Well... My dad's taking the job in Alabama... He said we should be moving in 30-40 days. Wants to get us there as soon as possible for school. I still say we're going to be moving to Arizona or White Sands. Gah, I really hate Alabama. Eh, I'm still having really mixed feelings about just moving in general, I always get that panicy feeling when I start thinking about it. Hmm, well don't really know what else to say about it... I'm going to miss it here, such fucking short notice.

She left, she's gone, but only physically.

She will be missed, it will be sad, but never forever

She walked away, she had no choice, but just for a little bit

She weeps for the one she loves, it gnaws at them both, but that is love

Always will she have someone, wither it is the one she loves truely or the one that draws a friendlier love

She sings her sad song for now, but only for a fleeting moment in the spectrum of eternity.                       

The eternity for her and her one.

Good-bye Bethany, you will be missed by so many here, well you already are.

Today was a great day. :D I got my surprise from David. Hehehe, it was a dozen roses. I feel so loved, ugh, why can't he be here... :( Oh well, que sera, sera. Weee, one more day of school. ~dances~ ok, now off to la la land
TIMMAY TIMMAY TIMMAY TIMMAY IS HERE!!! YAY! Rejoice Rejoice! :D Party time. Yippee. Hehehe, he brings so much happiness with him. Everyone must love that boy. :)

Wow, I don't really ever update anymore... I guess my life isn't interesting enough, which it isn't! :O Hehehe, Oh well. or it's just that I'm too lazy and forgetful. I like the first one though. Hmmm, I stole Axe Murder's (Ryan's) watch by accident. I took it to look at it and kinda didn't give it back. Hehehe, I'll give it to him tomorrow... They're such silly kids. EEk, James said that he ran into one of his friends yesterday and they said that all the tickets to Rock Am Ring were sold out. Oooo, that's true, I'm going to be SOOOO fucking mad. I guess I can try and order them offline still but... I don't know. My dad's gonna get it if I miss my chance and not get to go. Oh speaking of him. Guess what! :O He might have to go to Orlando for 2 weeks and is thinking about taking me with. I think it'd be kinda fun, though I want to see if I can go to El Paso for a week and get David (none of you know him, expect Mindy and Madeliene) to drive over so I get to see that boy. :) It'd be much fun. :D If not, still, I'd get to have the days to myself, run up room service and create chaos and not have my dad know about any of it! Mwahahaha. Good god, Accounting sucks! Grrrr, oh well. I hope something interesting happens soon. Hmmm, Oh I got to do a good deed this weekend, Heather and I stole Mindy friday and most of saturday. It had been the first time in 2 years she'd been allowed out without family or some churchy thing. Le Sigh, I want my ticket. Whitney said she'd come with me if the weather stays nice, and it looks like it'll stay. Awww, I forgot my camera though... We always have some sort of silly dressing up fun. Meh. Well, this has been my entry for now, I guess I should try and figure out this stupid Accounting shit. Gah

After rising to the to the occasion
Condoms should be pulled over the erected penis before every sexual contact in order to protect from sexually transmitted diseases and pregnacies. Gently remove the condom from the protective foil avoiding any damage by sharp figernails or jewellery. Hold the teat-end of the condom gently between your thumb and forefinger to get rid of any trapped air inside which might contribute to the condom breaking. Pull the foreskin of the penis back. Place the condom on the end of the erect penis, making sure it is the right way round with the roll of rubber on the outside. Use the other hand to unroll the condom gently down the full length of the penis.
What to do after "The Dead"
Soon after ejacualting withdraw the penis carefully whilest holding the condom firmly at the base to prevent spillage.
Condom Etiquette
Dispose the condom hygienically in the rubbish and do not put them in the toliet. Never use a condom twice.
Important!
ortant!If you know that you are allergic to latex you need to be careful with products made of natural latex. Protect against heat and direct sunlight. Please pay attention to the Batch-Nr. and the date of expiry on the condom foil.
Of you want it extra lubricated
If additional lubrication is required, only use a lubricant which is recommended for use with condoms. Never use oild based substances sucha as petroleum jelly, baby oil, body lotions, massage oils, butter margerine etc as these can damage condoms.
Certain medications used in the genital area may have a negative effect upon the safety of the condom. If you are using such medication, consulf your General Practitioner or pharmacist for specific advise. If you use spermicidal condoms frewquently and find that the permicidal lubricant cause discomfort, we recommend that you consult your doctor.
Attention!
In case of packages containing gadget condoms please not that those are not batch proofed and should not be used for precention and protection form sexually transmitted diseases.

Why am I letting this affect me so in the first place? It's because she basically accused me of lieing to my mom... I don't/can't lie to her. My mom is like a good friend to me. We're so close, so when she asked how the field trip was, I told her what I thought of it. The good and the bad. True it was mostly bad but that's because of how I saw it. For an optimist to go and find something like that bad and what not... I mean, it really was a sad trip. She kept wanting me to apologize basically for what my mom said. The only thing I said sorry for was that my mom had said it like that. That it might have been a miscommunication or something like that. I can't believe my mom would write her an email though and not tell me so that I can atleast be prepared... i mean sure I found out yesterday, but when I had tried talking to my mom, she would blow me off... Arg, sorry, I'm going to go vent out some how... Eh, maybe working on cars will help. I doubt, but oh well.

Quiz created with MemeGen!

Read this CAREFULLY!! Step One - Make a post (public, friends locked, filtered...whatever you're comfortable with) to your LJ. The post should contain your list of 10 holiday wishes. The wishes can be anything at all, from simple and fandom-related ("I'd love a Snape/Hermione icon that's just for me") to medium ("I wish for _____ on DVD") to really big ("All I want for Christmas is a new car/computer/house/TV.") The important thing is, make sure these wishes are things you really, truly want. - If you wish for real life things, make sure you include some sort of contact info in your post, whether it's your address or just your email address where Santa (or one of his elves) could get in touch with you. - Also, make sure you post some version of these guidelines in your LJ, or link to this post so that the holiday joy will spread.  
Step Two -Surf around for your friends list (or friends' friends, or just random journals) to see who has posted their list. And now here's the important part: - If you see a wish you can grant, and it's in your heart to do so, make someone's wish come true. Sometimes someone's trash is another's treasure, and if you have a leather jacket you don't want or a gift certificate you won't use -You needn't spend money on these wishes unless you want to. The point isn't to put people out, it's to provide everyone a chance to be someone else's holiday elf--to spread the joy. -There are no rules with this project, no guarantees, and no strings attached. Just...wish, and it might come true. Give, and you might receive. And you'll have the joy of knowing you made someone's holiday special. My Boring Wishes 1. To finally be myself 2. To see an old friend 3. A hug, a REALLY good  meaningful hug 4. To go to another concert 5. A good book 6. Some weird band CD, don't really care what type of music 7. A kangaroo stuffed animal 8. Any seasons of Zim 9. A postcard 10. To figure everything out with Monique World Peace would be up there but everyone should know that already If you actually feel like doing one of these: Sarah Lockridge Unit 29331 Box 75 APO, AE 09266 Phone Number: 011496227-812767 (If your here: 06227812767)

Alrighty, I'm having a dilema... The Slipknot/Slayer concert is coming up, it's on the 29th. it's pretty close too. see but there is one BIG BIG BIG problem... the tickets are 45.30 euros... :( I don't mind paying it, hell to go see them I'd probably pay more. See, Slayer has been my alltime favorite band since... I don't even know when. and then Slipknot, is like right next to them. So for them to be playing together is like a dream come true for me. that and as sad it is to hear, it would be my first REAL concert. and well... i can't think of anything better! josh says no cas it's too "violent" but i don't care!!! i WANT to get all bruised and sore and just Ahhh... :( oh well. see so here's the problem transportation!! See i was hoping that someone would be going, but see, since it's so expensive i don't think that many people will, and so it makes things alot more difficult. :( I don't wanna push it, cas when i do things don't usually work out, but i really really really wanna go... so please tell me what you think... is this a lost cause, me trying to go, or should i keep working at it?? well thanks bye bye

I can't believed i listened to it. ahh oh well, i promise i won't do that again! twas kinda scary. Anyways. I think i'm gonna go to the park or something...
